game.name: Backseat Drivers
game.categories: Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 궁극의 협동 운전 재난인 백시트 드라이버에서 우정을 시험해 보세요. 한 명이 운전을 하고 한 명이 길을 외치면 차는 폐차장으로 향합니다. 가능한 모든 장애물을 들이받고, 꺾고, 충돌하면서 길을 돌아보세요. 고함은 피할 수 없습니다. 사과는 선택 사항입니다. 차가 끔찍합니다.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A punishing 2-4 player driving test of your relationships. Gramma can't see and you can't drive. Together, you'll navigate the world's worst detour in an ancient car that handles even worse than it looks.

reviewHighlights.text: Hilarious game to scream at your friends with - and the friend pass is an awesome touch, nice job all!
Good game only one account needs the game to play with a friend. The story is so funny i love it
